long_description: The Patagonia MiniMass messenger bag balances the need to carry day-to-day vitals with the desire to stay light and move freely. It holds the basics: lunch, phone, keys, a book and a light rain shell. Padded main compartment has a drop-in pocket, a mesh pocket for visibility, an electronics pocket, pen sleeves and a secure zippered pocket. Interior sleeve holds most 13 in. laptops, iPads and small electronics. Large front flap features a zip pocket, a reflective panel and a webbing bike light mount (light sold separately). Side pocket carries a water bottle. Patagonia MiniMass features a fully adjustable, no-slip shoulder strap and top-side carry handle. The MiniMass is made of a tough yet lightweight 600-denier recycled polyester with a slick 200-denier, polyurethane-coated polyester liner. Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains.
short_description: The Patagonia MiniMass messenger bag balances the need to carry day-to-day vitals with the desire to stay light and move freely. It holds the basics: lunch, phone, keys, a book and a light rain shell.
